verses.roman:
sei gopī-gaṇa-madhye uttamā rādhikā
rūpe, guṇe, saubhāgye, preme sarvādhikā

synonyms: sei—those; gopī-gaṇa—the gopīs; madhye—among; uttamā—the highest; rādhikā—Śrīmatī Rādhārāṇī; rūpe—in beauty; guṇe—in qualities; saubhāgye—in good fortune; preme—in love; sarva-adhikā—above all.
translation: Among the gopīs, Śrīmatī Rādhikā is the foremost. She surpasses all in beauty, in good qualities, in good fortune and, above all, in love.

purport.content: Among all the gopīs, Śrīmatī Rādhārāṇī is the most exalted. She is the most beautiful, the most qualified, and above all the greatest lover of Kṛṣṇa.
